text: is a Japanese tarento, actress and fashion model. Sato is represented with Horipro. She won the Horipro Talent Scout Caravan Grand Prix. Sato is the second generation J.League female manager. She was an exclusive model for the magazine non-no. Sato is nicknamed . ==Filmography== ===Television=== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Network !
